scenario_text.value:
Miyuki isn’t alone anymore. She’s got Haru,
Takuma, and lots of other friends...

I guess that means she doesn’t need me to
keep her safe anymore.

You’re the one who kept me safe this whole
time! Without you, I’d have lost myself!

Don’t you ever say I don’t need you! It’s too
sad!

Please, we need to stick together. To support
one another.
I always want to be there for you!

You’d better! Because I’m counting on you,
Renamon!

I can feel it... Feel my bond with Miyuki!
It’s like a powerful warmth...
This is my... No, this is our power!

Miyuki, I will keep you safe. And...I will
protect this world!
Right! Let’s both save this world together!
